reviews.review: Dead By Daylight more like Dead By Gaylight
No Ultra-widescreen support, Makes the game super zoomed in and almost unplayable. You also don't have the choice of changing the ratio either. Sometimes it takes 10+ mins to get into a match.
THIS GAME IS THE BEST 1v4 KILLER VS SURVIVOR EVER.
Shit Game bugs galore, toxic community, mid graphics... Would buy it over again this game is a absolute blast! It gets even better with friends too this game is bad but amazing at the same time!
very funny game too play with youre friends and it is a game that never gets boring because of the game has many uppdates and much more very good game
Very fun game, basically 2 games in 1, play as a killer or survivor.
Honestly, I hate this game most of the time but I can't stop playing it. It's the worst and best game I've ever played. I'll have 4000 hours soon enough. I definitely recommend it.
คือพึ่งซื้อเกมมาซื้อตัวละครมากะสนุกเต็มที่ หาห้องไม่ได้เลย หามา 1ชม.กว่าแล้ว เกมนี้ไม่มีคนเล่นเเล้วหรอ งงมาก
Gente! necesito su ayuda.. no me encuentra ninguna partida no se que hacer si alguien sabe como solucionarlo por favor respondame!!!

-I started playing this game back on ps4 in 2017 and switched to pc earlier this year I have at least 1000+ hours on this game if you include console and all I gotta say is I 100% recommend this game.

-Yes most of the community is TOXIC but you can easily avoid it.

-The DLC is some of the best out there and if you have the money its worth the buy.

- its one of the best multiplayer games out there so you can have a good time with friends plus its cross play

- Yes you will have some very bad moments and probably uninstall the game once or twice or smash something but if you make it threw that and learn the game its one of the greatest multiplayer game out there.

- I 100% RECOMMEND

they have improved this game alot i went from trash ps4 to pc and its way better and they are balancing things out alot more, only thing bad to me is the trickster throwing knifes threw walls and i think he is a cheap killer
I love this game you should honestly play this game at night with friends it makes the game so much more fun.
apesar dos inúmeros bugs o jogo é muito bom.
Juego ql malo, no lo compren, esperen a que los giles de sus amigos se rajen
Recomendo se gostar de ver o choro dos outros, muito bom!

Love this game!

Good game if you are competitive, and fun to play with friends. 

Community can be toxic sometimes, but overall its pretty cool!
It's a fun game in theory, but with the amount of toxicity from players (be they survivor or killer) I simply find it hard to enjoy anymore. If you can get past that though it's worth a try!

I normally play on Xbox but dbd on computer is fun! the only complaint i have is sometimes when the killer swings at you it should not injure you because i have had so many time where the killer has swung and it should not have hit me. another thing is that this game doesnt have cross progression but other than those things its a pretty fun game!
Esta Bueno Pero solo para la gente q le interesa es bueno
Don't buy DLCs but fun and grind oriented. Bad company, good game.
Jogo de killer e peguei trauma de lanterna e t-bag, recomendo
muy divertido para jugarlo con amigos

save your sanity just dont do it once you get past about 500 hours you realize how awful this game and its devs are how much they lie and shit on the community as well as tons of bugs and exploits that have been around since the game came out and unbalanced survivor/killer perks and powers. just dont do it

This Game could be one of the best, BUT the developers do not care to take care of toxic behavior. When in 30 games only 2 are normal matches without disconnects, without flamming in afterchat, without bad mannering while tunneling and face camping, then something is very wrong with this game. 
So although when its working, it is a great game, you will have to invest so much time until you get one fun round, I can't recommend this game.
SÓ TEM KILLER QUE TUNELA, MAS É LEGAL
nice game to play with friends

Playing just to chat with survivors after a trial of tunneling. Finally I have some friend requests.
Would recommend 10/10
Jogo muito bom e o melhor é que ele é atualizado até hoje.
Jogo Divertido, porem com alguns bugs,porem deixa o jogo divertido, alguns sustos, e fica ainda melhor com amigos
it's so bad that it's fun

fun game, watch out for the usual bugs, dont try to win all the time or youll just get angry, you get good once you learn it, but be wary of players, some are just way to toxic and will call you out for dumb mistakes on their part
is a great game overall i the mechanics can get weird at some times but they are quick with patches

Total Bullshit Game they put Gay Lgbtq Flags in this Game and People who payed Money for it and dont like that Stuff and because of there Religion cant support it must obai to them!! Its a total Disaster and disrespectfull its a Political Message and you should be ashamed of yourself!!
good game but play at your own risk. hitboxes are non-existent
It's a game of hide and seek on steroids. If you like the horror genre or are just a psychopath, this game is for you!
游戏很好玩。看到三哥已经梆硬了。其他时候都吓得阳痿

Muy buen juego, recomendado por si quieres meterte a jugar horas y horas, la idea del juego es muy buena y rápidamente entendible cuando entras a jugar por primera vez, ahora existe un tutorial y todo a la hora que ingresas, para que te explique mucho mejor las funciones de todo lo que tiene el juego, para mi que llevo jugando mucho tiempo lo recomiendo bastante.
好游戏，给我心脏病治好了。

This game is cancer but so much to the point it's fun. I recommend 100%. At first to a new player, it seems overwhelming with how much new content and things implemented in the game but after getting the jist or understanding of the games mechanics, it can easily be an addicting game. I have over a thousand hours on console and 3 years on the game and can definitely say its worth it if you have some money laying around.
Игра плохая! Нет баланса, пробивают через окна и палеты, токсичное комьюнити, игра скучная. Не советую! На мейне 4 к часов.(уж поверьте)
